title: Client, play button -patcher issue?
body: Hello, so ive just got out of a game and i was unable to click play again thinking nothing of it i left the after match screen and went to the home screen to see the play button grayed out. It suggested logging out and re-logged twice and then i got a friend to invite me to game, go figure i couldnt accept the invite but after a while of the invite saying please wait it said "patcher disconnected" or something very similar to that. i also done a full repair and got the the text of Repair failed. also done a couple more things like restarting my pc, and running lol as an administrator. i got some more text from the client, apon trying to log in it goes you may not be able to log in due to a possibly lack of internet or something like that, i close it re open it log in every thing loads but the play button now has that piece of text and is still grayed out

replies.body: its happening again, i cant even file a ticket as it wont allow me too "auth.riotgames.comâ€™s server DNS address could not be found."and if i try to check the server i get this "The web page at http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address." i can log in, someone in the same city as me can play league but i cant even start up a lobby. the hell is going on with these servers

Hey there,

Sounds to me like an issue with your DNS, could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me. Let me know if this helps.
